name: Gravity Race
description:
This game was created during a 48h Game Development Challenge,

Try to beat your own high score or get a race with a friend. Bring your space ship safely to its destination without destroying it.

--------------------------------------------------

Thank you for supporting a small developer like me. What do you like and what do you think should be improved? Write it in the comments and maybe there will be updates in the future with more levels or gameplay. If you like, you can send me a screenshot of your HighScore and I will present it on this page. Have fun  Dev.mars
